(231x1+0)/1 mod 4096 = 231. (231x3+1)/2 mod 2048 = 347. (231x9+5)/4 mod 1024 = 521. (231x27+19)/8 mod 512 = 270. (231x27+19)/16 mod 256 = 135. (231x81+73)/32 mod 128 = 75. (231x243+251)/64 mod 64 = 49. (231x729+817)/128 mod 32 = 10. (231x729+817)/256 mod 16 = 5. (231x2187+2707)/512 mod 8 = 0. (231x2187+2707)/1024 mod 4 = 0. (231x2187+2707)/2048 mod 2 = 0. (231x2187+2707)/4096 mod 1 = 0.
